thread.section_title: The Marine Hermanus - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Oh I do like to be by the sea side
thread.title_full: Oh I do like to be by the sea side - Review of The Marine Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Mark E
title: Oh I do like to be by the sea side
text:
This a wonderful part of South Africa, the hotel itself is on on a beach but it's only a short ride away. You can walk down to the sea from the steps outside the hotel and enjoy a walk along the rocky coast line or go into the town and enjoy the many art gallery's, restaurants and shops.
We had a Lovely room, and these upside down birds nesting outside our window which were most entertaining.
Breakfast was perfect as was the spa treatments which I highly recommend.
Dinner in the restaurant was nice, but the restaurants around I think are better, I had the fish curry which was far to hot for me ( I should have ask before ordering).
